Articles.Content:
These seventeen usual suspects need identifying.

![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)![:sealed:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_lipssealed.gif)![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

**The Kerbal Smiles Gang**

The Kerbal Smiles Gang have been reported to congregate on this forum. Their faces have been seen many times.

What is the true identity of each one?

What kerbal name can you come up with?

Put a name to that kerbal face.

[TABLE=class: grid, width: 75%]

[TR]

[TD=width: 25%] **Kerbal Smiles**[/TD]

[TD=width: 25%, align: center] **Mugshot**[/TD]

[/TR]

Transcripts of communication of the suspects in italics are available for those who need to know.

Can somebody recognize the kerbal who did the artwork for these images?

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-10T22:15:43Z" title="02/10/2016 10:15  PM" data-short="8 yr">February 10, 2016</time> by MoeslyArmlis**

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) is Jebediah Kerman in flight

![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) is Jebediah Kerman when grounded from flights

I like to think of the smilies as:

![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif) - Bill

![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) - Jeb

![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif) - Bob

Val's a little difficult, as she's female and all of the Kerbal smilies are male. This actually strikes me as sexist, now that I think about it, but I've always identified her with the "kiss" smiley: ![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)

On a side note, *I've never actually seen the 'kiss' smiley used*, as far as I can recall.

I actually associate the general smiley ( ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) ) with sal\_vager, as he ends many of his posts with it.

I can't really 'give the identity' of any of the other smilies, but this could definitely be something to build a story around...

-Upsilon

> 
> I like to think of the smilies as:
> ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif) - Bill
> 
> ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) - Jeb
> 
> ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif) - Bob
> 
> Val's a little difficult, as she's female and all of the Kerbal smilies are male. This actually strikes me as sexist, now that I think about it, but I've always identified her with the "kiss" smiley: ![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)
> 
> ...

Nobody can disagree with those three. And the kiss for Val is also a good choice. We all love Val.

Can we agree that the winking smiley is Wernher Von Kerman?

*"I'm the best rocket engineer the KSC has ever had, but you probably knew that already.* ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) *"*

Angry: aka Mirror Greg when I made alliances against him.

Looks like there are some multiple sightings. This will help to confirm their identity. After a suspect receives multiple I.D.'s it will be polled.

For consideration: Community comic strip of the Kerbal Smiles Gang.

We still need three more positive I.D.s:

![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif) ???

We have i.d.'s on everyone.

But do not stop making identification. This gang is known for looking alike.

Suspicions arose when several new faces appeared in the community.  These suspects may be causing trouble around the forum so be on the look out for the thirteen members of the Amber Smiles gang.

The new forum change over has caused loss of formatting of tables in the first post. Anyone know how to quickly reformat a table?

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-10T22:16:42Z" title="02/10/2016 10:16  PM" data-short="8 yr">February 10, 2016</time> by MoeslyArmlis**

> 
> 
> 17 hours ago, MoeslyArmlis said:
> 
> 
> The new forum change over has caused loss of formatting of tables in the first post. Anyone know how to quickly reformat a table?
> 

Well. You click table. And add things into the table. ![:lol:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_laugh.png ":lol:")
